Text.val: 17.09.2009 SH SCR14885 Replaced blanks and - (=dash) by _ (=underscore), to
achive proper file handling in IFS
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CMON.CMON_YEAR, CMON.CMON_MONTH from :1/CMON CMON, :1/CLNT CLNT where CMON.CMON_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON.CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON.CMON_ADMNO = :2 order by CMON.CMON_ADMNO, CMON.CMON_CLNTNO, CMON.CMON_YEAR, CMON.CMON_MONTH for fetch only

SELECT CMON.CMON_ADMNO, CMON.CMON_CLNTNO, CLNT.CLNT110_NAME1, CMON.CMON_YEAR, CMON.CMON_MONTH, CMON.CMON_NDUNNINGLETTERSMAN, CMON.CMON_NDUNNINGLETTERSAUTO from :1/CMON CMON, :1/CLNT CLNT where CMON.CMON_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON.CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON.CMON_ADMNO = :2 order by CMON.CMON_ADMNO, CMON.CMON_CLNTNO, CMON.CMON_YEAR, CMON.CMON_MONTH for fetch only
